title: Need Help With What Champ I Should Play
body: Hello guys, and i dont know what champ i should play. People say im not really good. I am currently playing {{champion:37}}  and a little bit {{champion:35}} . Pleasee Help. Also i like having kills so i dont like support.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is intended for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.

Your post would be better suited for the [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) or the [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) boards.

Also who says supports can't get kills :P
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
